hero.superTitle: AdsViewer - View, test and optimize your ads in real-time.
hero.title2ndLine: ad performance is driven by the creative
hero.body: Stop over-focusing on the numbers alone, start focusing on the creative.
hero.body2ndLine: adsViewer.io aggregates and visualises your digital ads across major ad platforms to unlock greater insight and creativity. We offer a hub of solutions to view your ads, products & creative elements as they were displayed to your customers on web, mobile & app.
hero.tryForFree: Try for free no credit card required.

features.title: AdsViewer Features
features.subtitle: Core Features of AdsViewer
features.description: Platforms like Meta, Google & TikTok make it incredibly difficult to extract information about your ads. Sure there's companies which provide metrics - but what about the creative?

saas.title: Crafted for Growth teams
saas.description: Supercharge your advertising insights and increase your bottom line. Our platform can be used by SMB, Enterprise and Agencies!

highQuality.title: Popular Ad Platforms Included
highQuality.description: We offer previews and insights across Facebook & Instagram (Meta), TikTok, LinkedIn, Google, Snapchat, Reddit & More.

next13.title: AI takes center-stage
next13.description: We use Image Recognition to enhance your ad data and provide actionable insights to improve your ads.

sanity.title: A/B Testing
sanity.description: Testing is at the core of the product, compare ads across placements / platforms and use statistics to drive insights.

dbAuthStripe.title: Stripe for Billing
dbAuthStripe.description: Easily manage your own billing, or your clients billing straight through our platform.

freeUpdates.title: Automate Ad Creation
freeUpdates.description: Tap into ad platform APIs to automatically generate new ads across platforms at scale.

tabOne.title: Remove the clutter.
tabOne.desc1: Focus on what matters: your creative elements, the ads preview, and the metrics that you care about.
tabOne.desc2: Customize date ranges and get the insights you want, all whilst maintaining a view of your ads.

tabTwo.title: Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn & More
tabTwo.desc1: These ad platforms operate as walled gardens, making it extremely difficult to get creative insights.
tabTwo.desc2: Forget worrying about data in spreadsheets for creative analysis, no walled gardens, just results.

tabThree.title: Your creative renders in different ways
tabThree.desc1: Stories, Reels, Feed and Overlays are just a fragment of ways your ad serves.
tabThree.desc2: View every and all variations side by side, and filter for specific ways a User experienced your ad.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Pricing that just works.
pricing.description: Our distinct tiers offer friendly pricing for whichever usecase you might have.
pricing.tier1-packdescription: A starter kit with one login and last 7 days of Meta data.
pricing.tier2-packdescription: If you're serious about making improvements.
pricing.tier3-packdescription: A pack for teams with serious growth aspirations.
pricing.tier4-packdescription: Our most advanced Enterprise level offering.
